name: RaymondTalk
_source: s;Simon;You... we met at Lachesis's temple, right?
s;Raymond;We did, and again at Port Hull.{w} I was investigating a way in, but now...
s;Raymond;No, but I've decided that you're my best chance.
s;Simon;Why would I want to break into Lachesis's shrine?
s;Raymond;Because maybe, like me, you've discovered something.|Your "blessing" is a curse in disguise.
s;Simon;You're blessed by the Fates too?
s;Raymond;By Lachesis.{w} My blade can cut through any flesh,|but is just as likely to cut through my own.
s;Simon;I see. But my blessing isn't like that.
s;Raymond;I promise that it is.{w} Whatever boon it may grant,|I promise it is equally a curse.
s;Raymond;At the very least, you want me at your side.|Opening locks or necks, makes no difference to me.
s;Simon;A thief's help is invaluable.|Very well.{w} I don't trust your motives,|but you may work with us for now.
